    public class ObstacleBranch
extends Obstacle
    Represents the simple branch obstacle.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ObstacleBranch

        public ObstacleBranch(float x,
                      float y)
        A constructor for an Obstacle taking its position (x and y).

        Branch image is taken by default from C:\...\ENG1-Team-12\Implementation\core\assets. Random rotation is set.

    • Method Detail

      • getBounds

        public CollisionBounds getBounds()
        Returns a new collision bounds object for the branch obstacle.

        Creates a new collision bounds object representing the current position of this branch. See the collision bounds visualisation folder in assets for a visual representation.

        Specified by:
        getBounds in interface CollisionObject
        Overrides:
        getBounds in class GameObject
        Returns:
        CollisionBounds of branch obstacle
